title: Why Marc Elrich Won’t Protect Supreme Court Justices
sub_head: A Maryland official compares his county’s law to Putin’s Russia.
body: The Marshal of the Supreme Court, Gail Curley, has asked Montgomery County Executive Marc Elrich to enforce a local law against picketing private homes. Two of the Justices being protested by abortion activists live in his Maryland suburbs. But on a Wednesday press call, Mr. Elrich made the astounding claim that Ms. Curley is playing politics.
